headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Halloween in GTA Online Now through November 6th
content:
It's Halloween in Los Santos, which means it's time to terrorize the neighborhood while reaping the benefits of a litany of bloodcurdling bonuses and deadly discounts.

Get 25% off all returning Halloween content – including Masks, Face Paint, the Fränken Stange, Lurcher and the demonic LCC Sanctus – as well as the Duke O'Death.

Check out the Rockstar Newswire for all the details.
